context:
Test individual Discord command modules:

- Test clear.ts command (worker check, gRPC call, reply)
- Test pause.ts command (worker check, gRPC call, reply)
- Test skip.ts command (worker check, gRPC call, reply)
- Test resume.ts command (worker check, gRPC call, reply)
- Test queue.ts command (worker check, gRPC call, reply)
- Test summary.ts command with worker status
- Test all commands handle missing guildId
- Test all commands handle missing worker
- Test all commands handle gRPC errors
- Test command registration via registerInteraction

Acceptance: Each Discord command module has unit tests.
